title: NSA Awards AT&T $500 Million Multi-Year Surveillance Infrastructure Contract
description: NSA awards AT&T a massive multi-year contract worth over $500 million for surveillance infrastructure development, maintenance, and technical support. The contract covers specialized equipment installation, ongoing technical expertise, and continuous cooperation in intelligence collection operations.
significance: Demonstrates the massive financial incentives driving corporate participation in surveillance programs, creating a surveillance-industrial complex with significant profit margins.
